data.text: Mdala yawele na luhala kanguzengaga ng'handa ya heye,
Yalingudita mbuli zigoloche kangumdumbaga Mkulu Nguluwi,
Mpoka kangigazaga yuye kwa kulonga kwa kidaya,
Honhu halihela misenga ja kulimila, ng'hano za munhu zahela chinhu,
Mlolezi yalingukundigwa hambe yalonje udesi,
Yalingubeza kangupalaga luhala na hambe yapate,
Wiwiche kutali na mpoka,
Luhala lwa yula yawele na nyhala lwangumlajila nzila ya heye,
Wapoka wangusechelelaga gehile ga hewo,
Chila nhumbula yanguuzela usungu wake,
Ng'handa ya mwihe yobomoligwa,
Hana nzila youlingijesa kota ya goya,
Masinzo goweza kivisa kuli kuseka,
Munhu yajilile kobeta mafuza ga gala goyalingudita,
Mpoka kangukundaga chila chinhu choyalingulonjelwa,
Yawele na luhala ndo yalingilolela na kangiwikaga kutali na wihe,
Yalinguzudila himahima kanguditaga upoka,
Wasowile nyhala wanguhalilaga upoka,
Walingudita gehile wofugama hali wanhu wanojile,
Mzunwa kanguzudilwa mbaka na yowalingikalasa habehi,
Yalingumbeza yowalingikalasa habehi ndo yawele na gehile,
Yalingiwika goya kudita gehile, ndangukomya kanguwifya.
Kikangaza kuli chila mijito kwangigalaga chinhu cha mzidi,
Lufufu ndo chonolo kwa yula yawele na luhala,
Mlolezi wa kukomya kanguuloholaga ukomu,
Yalingumdumba Mkulu Nguluwi kana kitumbila kwimile nzinzili,
Kumdumba Mkulu Nguluwi ndo nzasa ya ukomu,
Lufufu lwa mndewa ndo winji wa wanhu wa heye,
Munhu yohawele wa kuzudila himahima kana luhala ng'hatu,
Kikala goya mnhumbula kwangumha munhu mong'ho,
Yalingumbunza mzunwa kangumliga Yamlumbile heye,
Mwihe kangudumigwa kwa madito ga heye ga wihe,
Luhala lwa kwa munhu yawele na nyhala,
Kutanganika kwanguwadita wanhu wa isi watogoligwe,
Mndewa kanguwaga yomha kunoga chitumagwa yalingudita kwa luhala,
